content: The problem is that all of the messages are from the bot, so even if you fixed all of the problems with message editing, reactions, message deletion, avatar syncing, quoting, replying, message linking, threads, and mentions you would *still* have the problem that every message comes from the same "account" on both sides of the bridge.

author: sky.cactus
content: It has always baffled me why people prefer Telegram over Discord.  The only answer I have ever received that was even mildly compelling was, "that is where all my existing contacts are".  Discord is more feature rich, equally centralized, and it now even has E2EE voice channels (not stages).
